alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:24AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An area of moderate rain will move across portions of eastern Elko county this morning... As of 420 am, radar is indicating an area of moderate to locally heavy rain moving across I-80 from Oasis east to West Wendover. Remote automated weather stations and Nevada Department of Transportation webcams are showing this rainfall. Rates of 0.2 to 0.4 inches per hour will lead to slick road conditions due to ponding of water on I-80. If driving on I-80 between Oasis and West Wendover this morning, please use caution and reduce speed to avoid hydroplaning. Also, use low beams when driving in reduced visibility. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
